channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s 19-year war on wind power is ‘weaponizing bureaucracy to undermine American energy production,’ critics say
item.description: Trump is tying wind and solar projects up in ever-increasing bureaucratic layers and reviews while expediting fossil fuels.

item.title: Jackson Hole live blog: Powell set to discuss Fed's plans for strategy changes
How oil and gold are sending an important message to stock-market bulls
ESPN and Fox roll out streaming services. But how much is too much for viewers?
China’s DeepSeek quietly releases an open-source rival to GPT-5—optimized for Chinese chips and priced to undercut OpenAI
item.description: DeepSeek is forcing the U.S.–China AI rivalry into sharper focus and may put OpenAI on the back foot following its disappointing GPT-5 launch.

item.title: Hulk Hogan’s death is still under investigation by local police
item.description: Clearwater Police said the “unique nature of this case has required us to interview multiple witnesses and seek medical records from a variety of prov...

item.title: The white-collar job market is frozen—now bartenders and baristas are seeing bigger wage growth than desk workers
item.description: Gen Zers who are lucky enough to get an office job: Don’t expect a raise.

item.title: Bitcoin dips ahead of Fed chair’s remarks at Jackson Hole
item.description: The world’s largest cryptocurrency is down almost 5% after notching an all-time high one week ago.

item.title: Rotation out of Big Tech sends S&P 500 skidding. How long will it last?
Stocks may need ‘tariff checks’ to keep rallying — but bonds wouldn’t like it
